Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Wing spar corrosion detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 05/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
